release-notes.note: Database updates are once again hosted on the official HCC website
(If you re-install HCC on top, Live Update will fix itself)
Fixed icons for Ponds, Wheelbarrows and Human Clock Tower
Fixed icons Jewelry - Repair, Crystals and Gift scrolls
Improved main toolbar for Windows 7 and newer
You can now minimize HCC via File/Minimize or by pressing CTRL-M
Hint: You can still switch to the horizontal mode
Older database versions are now considered downgrades
Fixed long standing issue with windows refusing to close
Speculative fix for a windows-redraw issue (white rectangle)
Live Update now uses HTTPS encryption (Windows 8+ only)
POD Plugin: Replaced curl with a custom Uploader (Windows 8+)
POD Plugin: Removed submission of email-address (GDPR)
